name: When Will Coin Crash?
description:
When will coin crash? is extremley fun and addictive game and rules are very simple:

- A coin will choose a wallet and head towards it. You simply tap on that wallet and collect that coin but DON’T tap on it if RED coin shows up..!

- We’ve also made things a little more difficult, so your fingers and brains will need to be in a sync. Yep..that coin is preeeety fast!

Be a part of cryptocurrency world and play the game now!
